case.title: SBM looking 4 SWF
case.text:
I'm looking for a single white woman , who is drug and disease free , down to earth, and looking for relationship. Someone who likes staying in and going out. Movies , beaches, traveling are some of the things I like to do. Me: 30, black, attractive, single, drug free , disease free ,no kids , no drama all fun and all great. Send a pic with your response.
Peace :]
